item.title: 아웃사이더(Outsider),트위스타(Twista) - Star Warz (별들의 전쟁)

작곡: EachONE / 작사: 아웃사이더, Twista
KY: 59575

난 brake가
박살 나 버린 Venom GT
이건 speed star와
Twista의 philosophy
Trap이든 dubstep이든
beat라면 일단 밟어
내가 돌아왔어
많이 기다렸지
Haters fakers xuckers
xuck you
먼저 내가 조질게
내게 모질게 구는 muse
Please have her
call me back
이 짜릿짜릿한 감각을
내 몸에 깊숙이 새겨 줘
Trap이든 dubstep이든
beat라면 일단 타고

빛과 빛의
마찰
새 역살 써 내려가는

when I’m on a beat
The wicked
I kick it
With the lyrics
you wanna see

and spit it
With the spirit
of a OG
And if you’re
near
What you hear it
and you fear it

and I’m a prodigy
I’m an anomaly
I wanna probably

with terror
Like we was

And though my flow is
the quickness
And my weapons
the armory
I hit ’em
with other xhit
To make sure they’re
never to bother me
‘Cause I’m
a specialist
Nevertheless
if it’s some people
That feel
like they wanna

guess at this

and hit ’em

about the way

anybody

not let me see

shoot

what anybody wanna do

like a semi shottie
Comin’ through

This work is
precious thing thing
That we waited
so long

언어가 달라도
너와 난 같은 시대

workout and forever

so long

over
